alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 5:47AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN VERNON PARISH IN WEST CENTRAL LOUISIANA AND NORTHEASTERN NEWTON COUNTIES THROUGH 615 AM CDT... At 546 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Burkeville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Ridder, Rosepine, Burkeville, Fort Johnson, New Llano, Burr Ferry, Evans, Pickering, and Wiergate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
